Price objective basis & risk Leidos Holdings (LDOS) Our PO of $235 is based on 0.9x relative EV/EBITDA multiple to the defense primes on 2026 estimates. We think a multiple slightly below the primes fairly reflects the near-term pricing pressure from transitioning some managed services programs to more commercial-terms and the opportunities at defense systems, healthcare, and border security. This equals a 13.5x EV/EBITDA. Downside risks to our PO are: cuts to the US Government budget vs. anticipated, increased competition from non-traditional players, problems integrating M&A, hiring the right personnel, containing its costs, estimating costs and executing on fixed price contracts, sustaining reputational risk and future awards. Upside risks to our PO are: a better than anticipated federal budget allocated to innovative technologies and modernization, inexpensive and well integrated M&A activity, unexpected capital return to shareholders in the form of dividends or share buybacks, market share gains, better than expected margin expansion.

Leidos Holdings "Merging for power" - LDOS/ENTRUST $2.4bn energy deal On Monday January 26, 2026, Leidos (LDOS) announced that it has signed a definitive agreement to acquire ENTRUST Solutions Group from Kohlberg for $2.4bn. Legacy LDOS ' energy business has been growing at double digits and is expected to generate ~$650mn. We see this acquisition as a strategic way to double down in a high growth high margin arena. We appreciate the compl e mentary capabilities ENTRUST brings to the portfolio , particularly in the addition of electric power generation and gas transmission & distribution capabilities . The acquisition also expands its footprint , making Leidos a top three energy transmission and distribution company. We maintain our Buy rating. Exhibit 1 : ENTRUST brings gas capabilities LDOS does not already have LDOS and ENTRUST capabilities within Electric and Gas energy & power For an accessible version Merrill clients call 800-637-7455; Merrill Edge Self-Directed clients call 877-653-4732 Electric: Power Generation Substation Transmission Distribution Usage Leidos X X X X

ENTRUST X X X X Gas: Production & Processing Transmission Distribution Usage Leidos ENTRUST X X Source: Company filings, BofA Global Research BofA GLOBAL RESEARCH ENTRUST: a premier power & energy services provider ENTRUST Solutions is an engineering, consulting, design, asset integrity, data solutions, and automation services provider for power and utilities customers. As we have noted, CEO Tom Bell highlighted Energy and Energy Infrastructure as one of the core pillars of LDOS ' North Star 2030 Strategy. LDOS expects to fund the all-cash $2.4bn transaction with new debt, cash on hand, and commercial paper. The transaction is expected to close mid-2026 and be immediately accretive to LDOS revenue growth and adj. EBITDA margin. The transaction is expected to be accretive to adj. EPS in CY27.

Leidos is an information technology (IT), engineering and science solutions provider. Leidos focuses on designing and building software-based systems, integrating hardware and software solutions, running and maintaining IT infrastructure and logistics/ procurement services. LDOS services defense, intelligence, civil and health end-markets.

Leidos is the largest US government contractor in IT, professional services, telecomm and other high-tech services areas. Leidos strategy of expanding scale and scope of capabilities is paying off and the company's organic growth was at the higher end of peer group in USG FY19, after lagging the group for some years.
